Description: Diademed head of Ptolemy I with aegis, right; border of dots. (obverse)
Eagle standing on thunderbolt with wings closed, left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (254) (type)
SNG Copenhagen / Sylloge Nummorum Graecorum: The Royal Collection of coins and medals, Danish National Museum (43 vols) (74) (type)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Ptolemy I Soter I
